edu.mills.findeatfood

Class RecipeDatabaseUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mills.findeatfood.RecipeDatabaseUtilities

  • public final class RecipeDatabaseUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides an interface that connects to the database. Activities and fragments should make calls here instead of trying to connect directly to the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void deleteRecipe(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db, java.lang.String recipeId)
      Deletes the given recipe from the database.
      static android.database.Cursor getAllRecipes(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
      Gets all of the recipes in the database by using SQLiteRecipeOpenHelper.

      Inserts the given recipe into the database by using the SQLiteRecipeOpenHelper.
      static java.lang.Boolean searchForRecipe(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db, java.lang.String recipeId)
      Searches through the database for the given recipe in order to not insert duplicates.

    • Method Detail

      • insertRecipe

        public static void insertRecipe(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                java.lang.String recipeName,
                                java.lang.String recipeId)
        Inserts the given recipe into the database by using the SQLiteRecipeOpenHelper.
        Parameters:
        db - Our SQLiteDatabase, where we will be inserting the recipe into.
        recipeName - Name of the recipe.
        recipeId - Id of the recipe. It inserts the RECIPE_TABLE into the database with the values of the name of the recipe and its id.

      • getAllRecipes

        public static android.database.Cursor getAllRecipes(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Gets all of the recipes in the database by using SQLiteRecipeOpenHelper.
        Parameters:
        db - Our SQLiteDatabase, where we will be getting all of the recipes from.
        Returns:
        Queries through our database to get the table and all of the names and ids of the recipes.

      • searchForRecipe

        public static java.lang.Boolean searchForRecipe(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                                java.lang.String recipeId)
        Searches through the database for the given recipe in order to not insert duplicates. Does this by querying through the database.
        Parameters:
        db - Our SQLiteDatabase.
        recipeId - Id of the recipe.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the recipe is found in the database and returns false if the recipe is not found.

      • deleteRecipe

        public static void deleteRecipe(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                java.lang.String recipeId)
        Deletes the given recipe from the database.
        Parameters:
        db - Our SQLiteDatabase.
        recipeId - Id of the recipe.
